File name of the file added to the selected folder = title of the attachment
Sub-folder name is configurable by end-user

功能?: Short-cut Keys for add / open/ delete the attachment
基本要求: short-cut keys are provided for user to add / open/ delete the attachment ( i.e. keyboard driven is supported)
An individual log is required to capture who add / update / delete the attachment (in audit trail)
Can Live Preview be supported ? ( i.e. a preview pane is provided in Name Card)
Subscription function: Email / System alert will be sent to subscriber when new attachment is added / updated / removed / renamed in the folder

DMS 文件夾和 文件Attachment裡面的Right都分成三種: Write(Add, upload, edit), View, Delete
-> 需要兩邊同步, 例如Employee 模塊對應於 /Attachment/Employee/
如果Employee的Attachment Right 設定為 Upload(RoleA, RoleB), Read(RoleC), Delete(RoleD)
那每一個employee Folder (e.g.  /Attachment/Employee/EMP001/ ) 的Folder Right 也會是Upload(RoleA, RoleB), Read(RoleC), Delete(RoleD)
而每次更新Employee的Attachment Right都會直接更新DMS裡的Folder Right
